English: Sends the flag for the next train mob into chat
Counter window -- for counter-based S ranks

Use a map image instead of blank background - Map Images Created By Cable Monkey of Goblin - http://cablemonkey.us/huntmap2/ -  Same thing for spawn point data :D - If map images aren't showing, please verify that you have the images downloaded in your plugins folder.
Allows Hunt Helper to scan while GUI inactive. Enables notifications, recording Train, etc. while this main map window is inactive.
Show the loaded hunt and spawn point data
Shows Zone Name\nAdjust position below as % of window.
Ctrl+Click to enter manually, Shift+Drag to speed up.
Alternate colour for when map image is used.
Shows World Name\nAdjust position below as % of window
Window Colour - Opacity can be changed down below.
Save a preset for quick switching - Size, opacity, position, and use map. Apply with command: /hh1 - Save with /hh1save or -->
Increase all icons proportionally, default: 1 - By Default, A Mob icon is 1.5x a Spawn Point, a Player icon is 0.2x a Spawn Point
Default represents 2 in-game coordinates. Modify if you feel this is inaccurate, default: 1
Background of the player / detection circle.\nChange the Alpha A: for opacity
Message to send to chat using /echo, usable tags: <flag> <name> <rank> <hpp>
Message to use with Text-to-Speech, usable tags: <name> <rank>

FlyText is the type of text that appears when you attack something or are attacked. (e.g. Crit, Miss, Resist)\n\nEnabling this will show a coloured FlyText notification near the middle of your screen.
Draws a 'quest pointer' type thingy, it's a bit glitchy but works well enough. Change size in settings
Size modifier for the diamond pointer
DOUBLE CLICK to easily highlight a tag option for copy and paste.  -- ONLY <name> and <rank> work with TTS
The big thing that labels highest rank mob in zone, S/SS > A > B - Ctrl+Click to enter manually, Shift+Click for fast drag.
Main = without map, Alt = with map images, - Turn up Alpha A: for solid colour.
A list of all nearby mobs.

HOW TO: Background - Click on any of the rows to send the relevant Map Link into chat. (Drag to reorder the list). Click on the checkbox to mark a mob as dead. Use the command \/hhn to automatically mark the current selected as dead, and send the next Map link into chat. (you will have to click the first one manually) *Does not allow duplicates (currently does not handle instances or different worlds) - Only records A ranks.
Show how long since the hunt was found.
Open the relevant map when /hhn used or when name clicked.
Show teleport buttons. Probably best to use this instead of tele on click.
Initiate teleport to closest Aetheryte when hunt is clicked. This will begin tele even if you try to reorder or click just for chat link.
Initiate teleport to closest Aetheryte when /hhn used.
Teleporting requires the Teleporter Plugin by Pohky. Please install it via /xlplugins or uncheck teleport options.
Are you sure you want to DELETE train data?
Nothing to import - or incorrect code. The export code is too long to be shared via in-game chat. Please share through Discord or something.
Overwrites current data with imported data
Imports new mobs and updates old mobs Last Seen times, if applicable
Export all currently recorded map data

Used for recording taken spawn positions. Helpful for position-specific spawns such as Nandi, Gamma, Tarchia, Burfulululu, Narrow-Rift, etc. Data persists and is saved to file, Turning recording off will reset tracked data.
Stop Recording -- This will WIPE all data.
Stop Recording All -- This will WIPE all data.
Nothing to import - or incorrect code
